channel.title: MMU on The IMSAI Gang
channel.description: Recent content in MMU on The IMSAI Gang

item.title: The MMU - Part 1: Design and measure
item.description: Creating an Memory Management Unit for the 8080 CPU Background and Theory As part of the project goal is to get this IMSAI to run a modern operating system with preemptive multitasking capabilities. A crucial component that is currently missing is the Memory Management Unit1. Having the memory management uint allows programs to be allocated “virtual address spaces”. This is great solution for multiple programs competing for the same blocks of memory.
